title: Which serif and sans serif fonts?
content:
Hi, can anyone help me identify the fonts in this absolutely hideous logo?

All help is much appreciated... need to redraw this carcrash (unfortunately not redesign it...)

/Hanna

comments.content:
SWEDEN TATTOO 2009  
looks like a modified Futura Extra Bold to me.
